016package io.micronaut.maven;
017
018import com.github.dockerjava.api.command.BuildImageCmd;
019import com.github.dockerjava.api.exception.DockerClientException;
020import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.ImageReference;
021import com.google.cloud.tools.jib.api.InvalidImageReferenceException;
022import com.google.common.io.FileWriteMode;
023import io.micronaut.maven.core.MicronautRuntime;
024import io.micronaut.maven.services.ApplicationConfigurationService;
025import io.micronaut.maven.services.DockerService;
026import io.micronaut.maven.jib.JibConfigurationService;
027import io.micronaut.core.util.StringUtils;
028import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
029import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution;
030import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
031import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Mojo;
032import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.ResolutionScope;
033import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
034import org.graalvm.buildtools.utils.NativeImageUtils;
035
036import javax.inject.Inject;
037import java.io.File;
038import java.io.IOException;
039import java.nio.charset.Charset;
040import java.nio.file.Files;
041import java.nio.file.Paths;
042import java.util.HashMap;
043import java.util.List;
044import java.util.Map;
045import java.util.Set;
046import java.util.function.Supplier;
047
048/**
049 * <p>Implementation of the <code>docker-native</code> packaging.</p>
050 * <p><strong>WARNING</strong>: this goal is not intended to be executed directly. Instead, specify the packaging type
051 * using the <code>packaging</code> property, eg:</p>
052 *
053 * <pre>mvn package -Dpackaging=docker-native</pre>
054 *
055 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
056 * @author Iván López
057 * @since 1.1
058 */
059@Mojo(name = DockerNativeMojo.DOCKER_NATIVE_PACKAGING, requiresDependencyResolution = ResolutionScope.COMPILE_PLUS_RUNTIME)
060public class DockerNativeMojo extends AbstractDockerMojo {
061
062    public static final String DOCKER_NATIVE_PACKAGING = "docker-native";
063    public static final String MICRONAUT_PARENT = "io.micronaut.platform:micronaut-parent";
064    public static final String MICRONAUT_VERSION = "micronaut.version";
065    public static final String ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME = "graalvm.native-image.args-file";
066
067    @SuppressWarnings("CdiInjectionPointsInspection")
068    @Inject
069    public DockerNativeMojo(MavenProject mavenProject, JibConfigurationService jibConfigurationService,
070                            ApplicationConfigurationService applicationConfigurationService, DockerService dockerService,
071                            MavenSession mavenSession, MojoExecution mojoExecution) {
072        super(mavenProject, jibConfigurationService, applicationConfigurationService, dockerService, mavenSession, mojoExecution);
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public void execute() throws MojoExecutionException {
077        checkJavaVersion();
078        checkGraalVm();
079
080        try {
081            copyDependencies();
082
083            MicronautRuntime runtime = MicronautRuntime.valueOf(micronautRuntime.toUpperCase());
084
085            switch (runtime.getBuildStrategy()) {
086                case LAMBDA -> buildDockerNativeLambda();
087                case ORACLE_FUNCTION -> buildOracleCloud();
088                case DEFAULT -> buildDockerNative();
089                default -> throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected value: " + runtime.getBuildStrategy());
090            }
091
092
093        } catch (InvalidImageReferenceException iire) {
094            String message = "Invalid image reference "
095                    + iire.getInvalidReference()
096                    + ", perhaps you should check that the reference is formatted correctly according to " +
097                    "https://docs.docker.com/engine/reference/commandline/tag/#extended-description" +
098                    "\nFor example, slash-separated name components cannot have uppercase letters";
099            throw new MojoExecutionException(message);
100        } catch (IOException | IllegalArgumentException e) {
101            throw new MojoExecutionException(e.getMessage(), e);
102        }
103    }
104
105    private void checkGraalVm() throws MojoExecutionException {
106        String micronautVersion = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(MICRONAUT_VERSION);
107        if (mavenProject.hasParent()) {
108            String ga = mavenProject.getParent().getGroupId() + ":" + mavenProject.getParent().getArtifactId();
109            if (MICRONAUT_PARENT.equals(ga)) {
110                String micronautParentVersion = mavenProject.getModel().getParent().getVersion();
111                if (micronautVersion.equals(micronautParentVersion)) {
112                    if (!mavenProject.getInjectedProfileIds().get(MICRONAUT_PARENT + ":" + micronautParentVersion).contains("graalvm")) {
113                        String javaVendor = System.getProperty("java.vendor", "");
114                        if (javaVendor.toLowerCase().contains("graalvm")) {
115                            throw new MojoExecutionException("The [graalvm] profile was not activated automatically because the native-image component is not installed (or not found in your path). Either activate the profile manually (-Pgraalvm) or install the native-image component (gu install native-image), and try again");
116                        } else {
117                            throw new MojoExecutionException("The [graalvm] profile was not activated automatically because you are not using a GraalVM JDK. Activate the profile manually (-Pgraalvm) and try again");
118                        }
119                    }
120                } else {
121                    String message = String.format("The %s version (%s) differs from the %s property (%s). Please, make sure both refer to the same version", MICRONAUT_PARENT, micronautParentVersion, MICRONAUT_VERSION, micronautVersion);
122                    throw new MojoExecutionException(message);
123                }
124            } else {
125                getLog().warn("The parent POM of this project is not set to " + MICRONAUT_PARENT);
126            }
127        } else {
128            getLog().warn("This project has no parent POM defined. To avoid build problems, please set the parent to " + MICRONAUT_PARENT);
129        }
130    }
131
132    private void checkJavaVersion() throws MojoExecutionException {
133        if (javaVersion().getMajorVersion() > 17) {
134            throw new MojoExecutionException("To build native images you must set the Java target byte code level to Java 17 or below");
135        }
136    }
137
138    private void buildDockerNativeLambda() throws IOException {
139        Map<String, String> buildImageCmdArguments = new HashMap<>();
140
141        getLog().info("Using GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION: " + graalVmJvmVersion());
142        getLog().info("Using GRAALVM_ARCH: " + graalVmArch());
143
144        // Starter sets the right class in pom.xml:
145        //   - For applications: io.micronaut.function.aws.runtime.MicronautLambdaRuntime
146        //   - For function apps: com.example.BookLambdaRuntime
147        getLog().info("Using CLASS_NAME: " + mainClass);
148        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = addNativeImageBuildArgs(buildImageCmdArguments, () -> {
149            try {
150                return dockerService.buildImageCmd(DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_AWS_CUSTOM_RUNTIME)
151                        .withBuildArg("GRAALVM_VERSION", graalVmVersion())
152                        .withBuildArg("GRAALVM_JVM_VERSION", graalVmJvmVersion())
153                        .withBuildArg("GRAALVM_ARCH", graalVmArch());
154            } catch (IOException e) {
155                throw new DockerClientException(e.getMessage(), e);
156            }
157        });
158        buildImageCmd.withBuildArg("CLASS_NAME", mainClass);
159        String imageId = dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
160        File functionZip = dockerService.copyFromContainer(imageId, "/function/function.zip");
161        getLog().info("AWS Lambda Custom Runtime ZIP: " + functionZip.getPath());
162    }
163
164    private void buildDockerNative() throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException {
165        String dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE;
166        if (Boolean.TRUE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
167            getLog().info("Generating a static native image");
168            dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_STATIC;
169        } else if (baseImageRun.contains("distroless")) {
170            getLog().info("Generating a mostly static native image");
171            dockerfileName = DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_DISTROLESS;
172        }
173
174        buildDockerfile(dockerfileName, true);
175    }
176
177    private void buildOracleCloud() throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException {
178        buildDockerfile(DockerfileMojo.DOCKERFILE_NATIVE_ORACLE_CLOUD, false);
179    }
180
181    private void buildDockerfile(String dockerfileName, boolean passClassName) throws IOException, InvalidImageReferenceException {
182        Set<String> tags = getTags();
183        for (String tag : tags) {
184            ImageReference.parse(tag);
185        }
186
187        String from = getFrom();
188        String port = getPort();
189        getLog().info("Exposing port: " + port);
190
191        File dockerfile = dockerService.loadDockerfileAsResource(dockerfileName);
192
193        if (appArguments != null && !appArguments.isEmpty()) {
194            getLog().info("Using application arguments: " + appArguments);
195            com.google.common.io.Files.asCharSink(dockerfile, Charset.defaultCharset(), FileWriteMode.APPEND).write(System.lineSeparator() + getCmd());
196        }
197
198        Map<String, String> buildImageCmdArguments = new HashMap<>();
199
200        getLog().info("Using BASE_IMAGE: " + from);
201        if (StringUtils.isNotEmpty(baseImageRun) && Boolean.FALSE.equals(staticNativeImage)) {
202            buildImageCmdArguments.put("BASE_IMAGE_RUN", baseImageRun);
203        }
204
205        if (baseImageRun.contains("alpine-glibc")) {
206            buildImageCmdArguments.put("EXTRA_CMD", "apk update && apk add libstdc++");
207        }
208
209        if (passClassName) {
210            buildImageCmdArguments.put("CLASS_NAME", mainClass);
211        }
212
213        BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = addNativeImageBuildArgs(buildImageCmdArguments, () -> dockerService.buildImageCmd()
214                .withDockerfile(dockerfile)
215                .withTags(getTags())
216                .withBuildArg("BASE_IMAGE", from)
217                .withBuildArg("PORT", port));
218
219        dockerService.buildImage(buildImageCmd);
220    }
221
222    private BuildImageCmd addNativeImageBuildArgs(Map<String, String> buildImageCmdArguments, Supplier<BuildImageCmd> buildImageCmdSupplier) throws IOException {
223        String argsFile = mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(ARGS_FILE_PROPERTY_NAME);
224        List<String> allNativeImageBuildArgs = MojoUtils.computeNativeImageArgs(nativeImageBuildArgs, baseImageRun, argsFile);
225        //Remove extra main class argument
226        allNativeImageBuildArgs.remove(mainClass);
227        getLog().info("GraalVM native image build args: " + allNativeImageBuildArgs);
228        List<String> conversionResult = NativeImageUtils.convertToArgsFile(allNativeImageBuildArgs, Paths.get(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory()));
229        if (conversionResult.size() == 1) {
230            Files.delete(Paths.get(argsFile));
231
232            BuildImageCmd buildImageCmd = buildImageCmdSupplier.get();
233
234            for (Map.Entry<String, String> buildArg : buildImageCmdArguments.entrySet()) {
235                String key = buildArg.getKey();
236                String value = buildArg.getValue();
237                getLog().info("Using " + key + ": " + value);
238                buildImageCmd.withBuildArg(key, value);
239            }
240
241            getNetworkMode().ifPresent(buildImageCmd::withNetworkMode);
242            return buildImageCmd;
243        } else {
244            throw new IOException("Unable to convert native image build args to args file");
245        }
246    }
247
248}
